immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Jin Durwhimmer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2297)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 36

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Jin Durwhimmer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2297)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=217" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 245</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Site Bound** A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 120
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious

**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Jin is put to rest if both Darivan (area C7) and the bloom of Lamashtu (area C10) are defeated.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 negative

**Rituals** 

- **6th**
[Awaken Animal](/Rituals.aspx?ID=3), [Commune with Nature](/Rituals.aspx?ID=7), [Primal Call](/Rituals.aspx?ID=19)

**Frightful  Moan** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The ghost laments its fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a Will save. On a failure, a creature becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 2 (or frightened 3 on a critical failure). On a success, a creature is temporarily immune to this ghost's frightful moan for 1 minute.

**Telekinetic  Assault** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The ghost cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a 30-foot emanation. Creatures in this area take 5d6 bludgeoning damage, subject to a basic Reflex save.

</column>
name: Jin Durwhimmer

Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location. --- AC 25 Fort +15 Ref +19 Will +19 HP 120 (negative healing, rejuvenation) Immunities death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious Rejuvenation (divine, necromancy) Jin is put to rest if both Darivan (area C7) and the bloom of Lamashtu (area C10) are defeated. --- Speed fly 25 feet Melee Single Action ghostly hand +19 (Agile, Finesse, Magical), Damage 2d8+10 negative Rituals - 6th Awaken Animal, Commune with Nature, Primal Call Frightful Moan Two Actions (Auditory, Primal, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental) The ghost laments its fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a Will save.
